description: Decimal part of a(n)^(1/11) starts with n so that a(n)<a(n+1).
mathematica: fps[n_,i_]:=Module[{c=RealDigits[Surd[n,11],10,10]},FromDigits[ Take[ Drop[ c[[1]],c[[2]]],IntegerLength[i]]]]; nxt[{i_,n_}]:={i+1,Module[ {x=n+1}, While[fps[x,i+1]!=i+1,x++];x]}; Transpose[NestList[nxt,{0,2},50]][[2]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 14 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Sep 15 1998
